alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:21PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Stone, southeastern Searcy and south central Baxter Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 221 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marshall, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall... Thola... Elberta... Leslie... Big Flat... Zach... Alco... Canaan... Morning Star... Oxley... Flag... Landis... Lone Pine... Harriet... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone
